title: How many eSIM can be added to the Pixel phones?
content:
I am thinking of buying a phone with dual sim support, and due to wide spread of eSims I want to have more than 2 sims in my device.
Because my points of life interests are in 3-4 different countries I want to store all sims in one device, and change them when needed.
I am even ok with having only sim working at the time, but with possibility to switch to another when needed.
I found that some Pixel phones support dual-sim.
But I could not find any information if these phones can store more that 2-3 esims?

Thanks
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
